synopsis.text: This animated series follows the journey of Shirobon, an inexperienced yet determined member of the Jetters, an intergalactic peacekeeping force. In a universe filled with diverse cultures and unique objects, the Jetters strive to protect the cosmos from the Higehige-dan, a notorious gang intent on stealing the universe's rarest treasures. Hailing from Planet Bomber, Shirobon is a Bomberman, an individual with special abilities to manipulate bombs, and he aspires to fill the shoes of his missing older brother, Mighty, a respected and powerful leader of the Jetters. As Shirobon and his eccentric team take on the Higehige-dan, he grapples with the challenges of overcoming his brother's disappearance and growing into a responsible and skilled Bomberman. Will Shirobon unlock the mystery behind Mighty's disappearance and rise to become the next great leader of the Jetters? Join Shirobon and his crew in this comedic and action-packed adventure through space.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
